undecided.Typography Treatment: Bold, sans-serif type on cube faces
undecided.Layout Logic: 3D cubes arranged in a dynamic, cascading manner
undecided.Visual Rhythm: Chaotic yet structured arrangement of cubes
undecided.Hierarchy and Focal Flow: Cubes guide the eye through dates and information

lva.Description: White cubes with black text and symbols appear to tumble across the page. The cubes are glossy and digital, creating a playful and dynamic visual rhythm.
The cubes overlap each other, creating depth and a sense of movement. The text on the cubes provides key information about dates and events, integrated seamlessly into the design.
A solid black background contrasts with the white cubes, enhancing their visibility and emphasizing the 3D effect. The background remains unobtrusive, allowing the cubes to stand out.
